name: 英文（三）：觀光英文
restrict: ◎必須先修過【共同英文(一)】◎必須先修過【共同英文(二)】
description: 在出國旅遊如此盛行的年代，如果可以更加確實地掌握觀光英語，除了能增加旅遊的方便性，也更能幫助我們理解其他國家的文化。本課程為欲學習觀光英語及相關旅遊知識的人所設計，其最大特色在協助修課學生日後出國旅遊之時，能夠更有勇氣與自信開口說英文。甚至讓有志者將來從事觀光旅遊業時，具備基本的觀光英語專業知識與溝通表達之技能。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Grading:**

**Grading:**

1\. Attendance & Participation: 30%

oPunctual attendance and active participation in class are highly expected.

#If you miss more than 4 sessions, you may fail this class.

#If you have to miss a class, please email me in advance, and mark it on the sign-in sheet.

#If you are habitually late, points will be deducted.

oClass activities

2\. Role Plays: 10%\*2

oGroup-based role play. You are expected to memorize the script and speak fluently.

oScript: typed, checked.

3\. Listening & Speaking Tests: 15%\*2

o Listening: Take-home exams. Audio files will be loaded to Moodle.

o Speaking: 2 tasks (reading, and solving the problem)

4\. Activities and Assignments: 20%

o Worksheets

o Assignment 1:

A. Find an airline ticket for your specific destination.

B. Find a packaged tour online in that destination.

C. Present A & B with screen shots (or web QR links) and explain why you make this choice.

(For example, there are many packaged tours at that place. Why do you pick this particular one? Please explain the reasons.)

\*1 piece of paper only!

o Assignment 2: Trip Planning

\*Design a personalized tour in Taiwan for the international student you receive.

\*1 piece of paper.

\*Your plan will be emailed to the international student afterwards.
